summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City's purchase of an interest in real property owned by Chief Seattle Club; removing a budget proviso restricting expenditure of an appropriation in the 2007 Budget; increasing an appropriation in the 2007 Adopted Budget of the Human Services Department; decreasing an appropriation in the 2007 Adopted Budget of Finance General; transferring cash between funds; and authorizing the purchase and acceptance of an easement with restrictive covenants from Chief Seattle Club to provide for social and community services uses on the property at 410 Second Avenue Extension South, Seattle, Washington for a period of ten years and the expenditure of funds therefore; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
